mng: stench, smelly, to smell (bad), repulsive, loathsome, terrible, bad, severely, ruthlessly, dud (ammunition)

exm.mng: smell of mother's milk not yet dried (idiom); immature and inexperienced, still wet behind the ears
body odor, bromhidrosis, armpit odor, underarm stink, also called 狐臭[hu2 chou4]
to show off one's good looks shamelessly
stinky tofu, strong-smelling preserved beancurd, fig. rough exterior but lovable person
